title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW TO COVER AN ECONOMY IN CRISIS
description: Rick Brooks from The Wall Street Journal shares tips on how to cover an economy in crisis, including connecting the dots between individuals and financial institutions, localizing data, and highlighting real-life examples.
